explains: adv. 实质地；物质上；极大地

sentences.en: They were supported by us both materially and spiritually.
sentences.cn: 他们既得到了我们的物质上的支持也得到我们精神上的声援。

sentences.en: Materially they are no better off.
sentences.cn: 他们的物质生活并没有改善。

sentences.en: He has tried to help this child materially and spiritually.
sentences.cn: 他已经尽力在物质和精神上帮助这个孩子了。
